content.rendered:
Directed by Shashanka Ghosh

Written by Parveez Sheikh. Parveez Sheikh. Aseem Arrora

Cast Kartik Aaryan (Dr. Freddy Ginwala). Alaya f (Kainaaz Irani). Karan Pandit (Raymond (as Karan A. Pandit)). Sajjad Delafrooz (Rustom). Myrna S. Dalal (Persis Aunty). Kamalrukh Khan (Freddy’s Mother (as Kamalrukh W. Khan)). Vihaan Chaudhary (Freddy’s Father). Harshika Kewalramani (Shirin Mistry). Anansuya Chakraborty (Receptionist). Jeniffer Piccinato (Avan Unwalla). Naresh Kumar (Inspector Yadav). Rajendra Arjun Kamble (Police). Chitra (Mrs. Puri). Priyal Gupta (Boy 1). Tarun Dudeja (Boy 2). Trisha N. Shetty (Girl 2). Hridansh Parekh (Rohan). Avni Kale (Young Girl). Abeer Jain (Young Freddy). Swara Dharaiya (Freddy’s Daughter). Gautam S. Gadaballi (Homeless Man). Ganesh Kumar (Senior Inspector Rane). Tripti Agarwal (Kainaaz’s Mother). Shahrukh B. Sadri (Kainaaz’s Father). Nitin Bharadwaj (Blue CafÃ© Waiter). Amir Khan (Key Maker). Sharma Karan (Doctor). Atul Ganonkar (CCTV Guy). Rohit Singh (Snake Catcher). Ashit Kumar (Srikant). Fareed Khan (Ramu Kaka). Farzil Pardiwalla (Homi Manager). Mahabanoo Mody-Kotwal (Shehnaaz Aunty at Wedding)

Language Hindi

Producers Gaurav Bose. Narendra Hirawat. Shreyans Hirawat. Ekta Kapoor. Shobha Kapoor. Amit Ajit Naik. Jay Shewakramani.

Production Balaji Motion Pictures. NH Studioz. Northern Lights Films
